name: Elixir of Darksight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Dwarves/New Racial Rules/Dwarven Magic Items/Elixir of Darksight

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, darkvision, deeper darkness

sections.body: This dark, syrupy draught doubles the range of the drinker's darkvision and also enables her to see through deeper darkness when using darkvision. The effects last for 1 hour.
sections.name: Description
